content.text: 12 medium potatoes - peeled, cooked and cubed
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "12 medium potatoes - peeled, cooked and cubed" )
( ing-1 "3 cups cubed fully cooked ham" )

content.text: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli, thawed
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli, thawed" )

content.text: 0) In a large skillet, cook potatoes, ham and onion in butter, stirring frequently, until potatoes are lightly browned.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "cook"@23:27 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "potatoes"@28:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "ham"@38:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "onion"@46:51 / FOOD )
		:loc ( ing-3 "butter"@55:61 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large skillet"@6:21 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-0-0 "until potatoes are lightly browned"@84:118 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-0-1 "stirring"@63:71 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Serve with sour cream if desired.
